extendedInfo.description: Lynette's conniving husband has cheated her out of her family business! What can an enterprising young woman like her do? Get revenge! Use your business savvy to help Lynette repurchase her company and send her husband to the slammer. Buy, develop and sell commercial properties to make a profit; build attractions that increase your income; and keep your eye on the bottom line as you purchase materials and hire workers. The point-and-tap fun of Hotel Mogul will have you laughing all the way to the bank!LITE VERSION INCLUDES:â Two exotic settings (of five available in the full version)â 10 levels (of 35)â One mini-game (of four)â Three kinds of hotels (of six)â Vibrant graphics and sound!--------More fun games from Alawar:â GOURMANIA â Become the world's top chef in this addictive hidden object smash hit!â SUNSHINE ACRES - Don't pass up your chance to farm one of the most beautiful places on Earth!--------FIND US: www.facebook.com/AlawarEntertainmentFOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/alawargamesBe the first to hear about our new games and awesome contests!

reviews.comment: So much fuuuun! Promise. Two thumbs up, for this game! Very awesome. I like it sooo much :)) Loveeeet.\303\274 Nice app for Xperia x1o.

reviews.title: what a shame
reviews.comment: Screen flickering makes this unplayable on the xoom. Otherwise, it\'s a good game and I like it. Lots of fun and has good strategy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good game. One issue on Evo: exiting game \"freezes\" phone. Solution: hit on/off button twice to un-freeze. * Still, it\'s annoying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I give it three stars because while the game does work on my Droid X it has some flickering issues. I know it\'s meant for the nexus but why limit it?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good game, going to buy it. Guess my progress will be lost? Btw: why is the lite version LARGER than the full version? :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks like a good game, but screen is too big for my HTC tattoo. I can\'t see many of the controls, glad I didn\'t buy full version
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Every time I go to buy materials it freezes, or it will bring up the tab but won\'t let me buy them. Never made it through the tutorial. Droid X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but graphics messed up
reviews.comment: Its a good game but the graphics are messed up, would bit but no fun playing when you can\'t see it properly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: APP2SD FOR A 25MB APP!!! WTF IS WRONG WITH THESE DEVELOPERS?!?!?

reviews.comment: Cool..but it really doesn\'t look HD at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stutters on Tegra phones.
reviews.comment: Still has not been updated to function on Tegra-based phones, despite promises three months ago by customer service of \"a release in 2-3 weeks\". Good game, but the stuttering graphics kill it for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sara
reviews.comment: It is fun so far can\'t wait to get full version yaaaaaaaaa!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Locks up.
reviews.comment: When I have to put my asus eepad to sleep the game locks up and i have to force close and reopen the program. Same thing if i open another program and come back to the game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun game but everytime I exit the game it takes off my live wallpaper. Moto Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works but doesn\'t fit on wildfire screen properly (left an right of screen truncated)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t run properly on TEGRA 250 dual-core phones. Screen refreshes and moving objects flicker and \"phase in & out\". VERY STRAINING FOR THE EYES
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: original game doesnt fit on my droid (resolution too small). Hd for nexus version fits and looks nice, but freaks out a lot, graphics flicker.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun game, works great on N1!

reviews.comment: I enjoyed the 10th levels, but the memory use is crippling. Shame i\'m uninstalling rather than purchasing the full version. Desire 2.2.
